record.description: The Midway before Harper Library and many of the other buildings of the University's mile-long Gothic front had been built. The south end of Haskell Museum is to the left; the Law School (Stuart Hall) is in the center; and, Foster and Kelly Halls are to the right.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Upper left corner missing, several tears along the edges and some cracks around the bottom right corner. Stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Public Relations Office.
